sql:statement.name: ContractBreakPenalty
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.seq_no, a.accessno, a.accountno, a.subid, a.svcnbr, a.chargetypeid, a.captiontext, a.effectivedate, a.expirationdate, a.negotamt, a.negotpct, a.baseamt, a.period, a.sp_area_id, a.tax_category, a.dt_exp_agr, a.dt_eff_agr, a.servicename, a.origem, a.negot_type, a.tax_included FROM r68_contractcancel a WHERE a.accountno = ? and dt_eff_agr <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') -- corte and (dt_exp_agr is null or dt_exp_agr between to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) -- inicio e corte and ( (expirationDate is null and effectiveDate <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) -- corte or (expirationDate is not null and expirationDate >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') -- inicio and effectiveDate <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') -- corte ) ) AND a.accountno = ? AND chargeTypeId in ( 'CANCEL', 'CANCELADO', 'PERMBAS12', 'CAN0000000000000000000000','MUL0000000000000000000000', 'CON0000000000000000000000') and dt_eff_agr <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') -- corte and (dt_exp_agr is null or dt_exp_agr between to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) -- inicio e corte and effectiveDate <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') -- corte and (expirationDate is null or expirationDate >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) -- inicio and dt_exp_agr <> dt_eff_agr

sql:statement.name: PriorityOrder
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT DISTINCT SBSCRP_ID, CAPTN_TEXT, svc_name, PRCNG_PRI, SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT, SVC_AGRMNT_TRMNTN_DT, SBSCRP_SVC_EFF_DT, SBSCRP_SVC_EXPR_DT FROM r56_priority_order WHERE sbscrp_id = ? and ((svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is null and SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is not null and svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and svc_agrmnt_eff_dt <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd'))) and ((SBSCRP_SVC_EXPR_DT is null and SBSCRP_SVC_EFF_DT <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (SBSCRP_SVC_EXPR_DT is not null and SBSCRP_SVC_EXPR_DT >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and SBSCRP_SVC_EFF_DT <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: InterestFee
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.cycle_cd, a.acct_nbr, a.carriercode, a.carrierstate, a.valortotal, a.data_multa_juros, a.valor_multa_juros, a.tipo_cobranca, a.data_pagamento, a.data_vencimento_pagto, a.data_vencto_apl_juros_multas, a.dat_ref_apl_juros_multa, a.docamt FROM r69_82_interestfee a WHERE a.acct_nbr = ? AND a.acct_nbr = ? AND a.cycle_cd = ? AND (a.data_vencimento_pagto >= to_date(?, 'yyyymmdd') AND a.data_vencimento_pagto <= to_date(?, 'yyyymmdd'))

sql:statement.name: SUBS
sql:statement.sql:query: select count(*) from bck_consequence

sql:statement.name: R08_SubscriptionPlan
sql:statement.sql:query: select a.svc_name from R08_Subscription_Plan a where sbscrp_id = ? and ((svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is null and to_date(SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is not null and to_date(svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(svc_agrmnt_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) ) and ((svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is null and to_date(SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is not null and to_date(svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(svc_agrmnt_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) )

sql:statement.name: R08_AccountAndCycleChange
sql:statement.sql:query: select to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, acct_nbr, cycle_cd, to_date(acct_cycle_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') acct_cycle_eff_dt, acct_cycle_eff_tm, sbscrp_id from R08_AccountAndCycleChange where sbscrp_id = ? and ((sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) )

sql:statement.name: R08_SubscriptionServices
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.acct_nbr, a.cycle_cd, a.sbscrp_id, a.captn_text, a.svc_name, to_date(nvl(a.sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, '99991231'), 'yyyymmdd') sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, to_date(nvl(a.SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT, '99991231'),'yyyymmdd') SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT, to_date(nvl(a.SVC_AGRMNT_TRMNTN_DT, '99991231'),'yyyymmdd') SVC_AGRMNT_TRMNTN_DT, to_date(nvl(a.SBSCRP_SVC_EFF_DT, '99991231'), 'yyyymmdd') SBSCRP_SVC_EFF_DT, to_date(nvl(a.SBSCRP_SVC_EXPR_DT, '99991231'),'yyyymmdd') SBSCRP_SVC_EXPR_DT FROM r08_subscription_services a WHERE ACCT_NBR = ? AND CYCLE_CD = ? and ((svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is null and to_date(SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is not null and to_date(svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(svc_agrmnt_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) ) and ((sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd'))) and ((svc_price_expr_dt is null and to_date(svc_price_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (svc_price_expr_dt is not null and to_date(svc_price_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(svc_price_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: R13_ProgressiveDiscountPlans
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT svc_price_seq_nbr FROM r13_progressive_discounts where svc_price_seq_nbr = ? and ((dscnt_avail_end_dt is null and to_date(dscnt_avail_start_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (dscnt_avail_end_dt is not null and to_date(dscnt_avail_end_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(dscnt_avail_start_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) )

sql:statement.name: R20_BlockedSubscription
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.sbscrp_id, a.sbscrp_access_line_seq_nbr FROM r20_blockedsubscription a WHERE sbscrp_id = ?

sql:statement.name: R20_AccHirch
sql:statement.sql:query: select distinct acct_hirch_id from R20_AccHirch where acct_nbr=? and hirch_acct_asgm_eff_dt <= ? and (hirch_acct_asgm_expr_dt is null or hirch_acct_asgm_expr_dt >= ?)

sql:statement.name: FullHierarchy
sql:statement.sql:query: select acct_nbr from R20_AccHirch where acct_hirch_id=? and hirch_acct_asgm_eff_dt <= ? and (hirch_acct_asgm_expr_dt is null or hirch_acct_asgm_expr_dt >= ?)

sql:statement.name: R30_FavoriteList
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.sbscrp_origem, a.dt_eff_favorito DT_EFF_FAVORITO, nvl(a.dt_exp_favorito, '99991231') DT_EXP_FAVORITO, a.linha_destino, a.acct_nbr, a.cycle_cd, a.sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, a.access_nbr_asgm_expr_dt FROM r30_favoritelist a where acct_nbr = ? and cycle_cd = ? and ((SBSCRP_ASGM_EXPR_DT is null and to_date(SBSCRP_ASGM_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (SBSCRP_ASGM_EXPR_DT is not null and to_date(SBSCRP_ASGM_EXPR_DT, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(SBSCRP_ASGM_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) ) and ((access_nbr_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(access_nbr_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (access_nbr_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(access_nbr_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(access_nbr_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) )

sql:statement.name: R30_ServiceListCode
sql:statement.sql:query: select list_cd, list_desc from R30_SERVICELISTCODE where svc_name = ?

sql:statement.name: R31_IntraGroupType
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT svc_name, ATTR_GROUP_NAME FROM R31_IntraGroupType where svc_name = ?

sql:statement.name: R31_IntraGroupAccount
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.acct_nbr, a.cust_id_text FROM r31_intragroupaccount a where a.access_nbr = ?

sql:statement.name: R31_IntraGroupHirch
sql:statement.sql:query: select ACCESS_NBR from R31_INTRAGROUPHIRCH where PARENT_ACCT_NBR = ? and ((HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT is null and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT is not null and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT , 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd'))) and ACCESS_NBR = ? and ((HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT is null and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT is not null and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT , 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd'))) and ((sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd'))) and ((HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT is null and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT is not null and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EXPR_DT , 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(HIRCH_ACCT_ASGM_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: R32_PlanServices
sql:statement.sql:query: select access_nbr_rqr_flag from R32_PLANSERVICE where svc_id = ?

sql:statement.name: R66_AccessNumberAutoPromotions
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT sbscrp_id, captn_text, mktg_pgm_id, comm_svc_area_id, svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt, svc_agrmnt_eff_dt, sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt FROM R66_AccessNumberAutoPromotions WHERE acct_nbr = ? and ((svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is null and to_date(SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is not null and to_date(svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(svc_agrmnt_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) ) and ((sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: R66_AccessNumberPromotions
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.mktg_pgm_id, a.sbscrp_id, a.captn_text, a.comm_svc_area_id, a.mktg_pgm_enroll_dt FROM r66_accessnumberpromotions a where 'dummy' != ?

sql:statement.name: R66_AccountPromotions
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.mktg_pgm_id, a.mktg_pgm_desc, a.comm_svc_area_id, a.mktg_pgm_enroll_start_dt FROM r66_accountpromotions a where 'dummy' != ?

sql:statement.name: R66_PromotionDetails
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.mktg_pgm_id, a.begin_cycle_nbr, a.end_cycle_nbr, a.reward_amt, a.comm_svc_area_id, a.auto_enroll_flag, a.appl_ind, a.promo_level_ind, a.reward_type_cd FROM r66_promotiondetails a where mktg_pgm_id = ? and comm_svc_area_id = ?

sql:statement.name: R66_AccessNumberUsedRewards
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.acct_nbr, a.sbscrp_id, a.mktg_pgm_id, a.cycle_cd, a.cycle_end_dt, a.reward_dollar_amt FROM r66_accessnumberusedrewards a WHERE MKTG_PGM_ID = ? AND SBSCRP_ID = ? AND TO_DATE(CYCLE_END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD')

sql:statement.name: R66_AccountUsedRewards
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.acct_nbr, a.mktg_pgm_id, a.cycle_cd, a.cycle_end_dt, a.reward_dollar_amt FROM r66_accountusedrewards a WHERE MKTG_PGM_ID = ? AND acct_nbr = ? AND TO_DATE(CYCLE_END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD')

sql:statement.name: R66_PromotionCriteria
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT a.mktg_pgm_id, a.captn_text, a.crtra_and_or_ind, a.comm_svc_area_id FROM r66_promotionscriteria a, dual where mktg_pgm_id = ? and comm_svc_area_id = ? and 'dummy' != ? and 'dummy' != ? and 'dummy' != ?

sql:statement.name: ProgressiveDiscount1
sql:statement.sql:query: select mktg_pgm_id, svc_name, captn_text, tier_min_amt, tier_max_amt, reward_amt from R20_MKT where svc_name = ?

sql:statement.name: DataBarnRerateFlag
sql:statement.sql:query: select svc_price_seq_nbr, rerate_incol_flag, svc_price_eff_dt, svc_price_expr_dt from svc_price where svc_price_seq_nbr = ? and ? between svc_price_eff_dt and svc_price_expr_dt

sql:statement.name: DataBarnSubscription1
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT sbscrp_id, expr_dt, eff_dt FROM r40_databarnsubscription1 where 'dummy' != ? and ((expr_dt is null and to_date(eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (expr_dt is not null and to_date(expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd'))) and ((expr_dt is null and to_date(eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (expr_dt is not null and to_date(expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: DataBarnSubscription2
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT acct_nbr, sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt FROM r40_databarnsubscription2 where 'dummy' != ? and ((sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: DataBarnSubscription3
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT cycle_cd, acct_cycle_eff_dt FROM r40_databarnsubscription3 where 'dummy' != ?

sql:statement.name: DirectDebitInfo
sql:statement.sql:query: select p.acct_nbr conta, p.bank_acct_nbr conta_corrente from r52_pymtmethod p where acct_nbr = ? and ( (pymt_method_expr_dt is null and to_date(pymt_method_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (pymt_method_expr_dt is not null and to_date(pymt_method_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(pymt_method_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) )

sql:statement.name: ClientGeneralInfo
sql:statement.sql:query: select distinct nvl(e.bus_name,e.first_name ||' '|| e.middle_name ||' '|| e.last_name), i.street_name || ', ' || i.house_nbr, i.delvry_1_text || ' ' || i.delvry_2_text, i.county_name, i.postal_cd || '-' || i.postal_plus_cd || ' ' || i.city_name || ' - ' || i.state_cd, d.cust_idntfc_type_cd, d.cust_id_text from r52_sbscrp_asgm b, r52_cust_acct c, r52_cust_idntfc d, r52_cust e, r52_cust_addr i where b.acct_nbr = c.acct_nbr and c.cust_id = d.cust_id and d.cust_id = e.cust_id AND (D.cust_idntfc_type_cd LIKE '%CPF%' OR D.cust_idntfc_type_cd LIKE '%CNPJ%') and e.cust_id = i.cust_id and c.cust_id = e.cust_id and c.mlng_addr_seq_nbr = i.addr_seq_nbr AND b.acct_nbr =? and ((addr_expr_dt is null and to_date(addr_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (addr_expr_dt is not null and to_date(addr_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(addr_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) ) and ( (sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) )

sql:statement.name: ServicesByPlan
sql:statement.sql:query: select distinct member_svc_name from r73_package_services where svc_price_seq_nbr_plan = ? and ((svc_price_expr_dt is null and to_date(svc_price_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (svc_price_expr_dt is not null and to_date(svc_price_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(svc_price_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: ServicesByAccount
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT DISTINCT ACCT_NBR, CYCLE_CD, SBSCRP_ID, svc_name, svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt, svc_agrmnt_eff_dt FROM R73_SUBSCRIPTION_SERVICES WHERE ACCT_NBR = ? AND CYCLE_CD = ? and ((svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is null and to_date(SVC_AGRMNT_EFF_DT, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is not null and to_date(svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(svc_agrmnt_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd'))) and ((sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: R53_TechSubscription
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT chnl_type_ind FROM r53_technology_subscription WHERE sbscrp_id= ?

sql:statement.name: R53_TechService
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT DISTINCT chnl_type_ind, trim(CAPTN_TEXT) as CAPTN_TEXT FROM r53_technology_service

sql:statement.name: R55_NegotProd
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT svc_name, negot_eff_dt, NVL(negot_expr_dt,TO_CHAR((SYSDATE+999), 'yyyymmdd')) AS negot_expr_dt, svc_price_seq_nbr FROM R55_negotiable_products WHERE svc_name=(select distinct svc_name from R55_negotiable_products where svc_price_seq_nbr=?) AND sbscrp_id=? AND (TO_DATE(negot_expr_dt,'yyyymmdd') >= TO_DATE(?,'yyyymmdd') OR negot_expr_dt is null) AND TO_DATE(negot_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= TO_DATE(?,'yyyymmdd') ORDER BY svc_price_seq_nbr, negot_eff_dt

sql:statement.name: R63_ProductRelationDTBN
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT service1, service2, relation FROM R63_SVC_USE_RULE

sql:statement.name: R69_CityByZipCode
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT num_cep cep, dsc_localidade cidade FROM r69_localidade_cep WHERE num_cep = ?

sql:statement.name: R74_SharingServ
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT DISTINCT sbscrp_id, captn_text, svc_name, leader_sbscrp_id, free_usage_across_acct_ind, usage_acum_seq_nbr, access_nbr_rqr_flag, comm_svc_area_id FROM R74_Sharing_Service WHERE acct_nbr = ? AND cycle_cd = ? AND charge_type_cd = 'F' AND ( ( svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is null AND to_date(svc_agrmnt_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) OR ( svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt is not null AND to_date(svc_agrmnt_trmntn_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') AND to_date(svc_agrmnt_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) ) AND ( ( sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is null AND to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) OR ( sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt is not null AND to_date(sbscrp_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') AND to_date(sbscrp_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') ) )

sql:statement.name: R74_SharingPlan
sql:statement.sql:query: select distinct svc_name from R74_sharing_plan where usage_acum_seq_nbr = ? and access_nbr_rqr_flag = 'Y' and comm_svc_area_id = ? and ((svc_price_expr_dt is null and to_date(svc_price_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) -- corte or (svc_price_expr_dt is not null and to_date(svc_price_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') -- inicio and to_date(svc_price_eff_dt , 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) -- corte )

sql:statement.name: R78_AccHirch
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT acct_nbr, parent_acct, acct_hirch_id, hirch_acct_asgm_eff_dt, hirch_acct_asgm_expr_dt FROM r78_acctypeandhirch WHERE acct_nbr = ? and ((hirch_acct_asgm_expr_dt is null and to_date(hirch_acct_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')) or (hirch_acct_asgm_expr_dt is not null and to_date(hirch_acct_asgm_expr_dt, 'yyyymmdd') >= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and to_date(hirch_acct_asgm_eff_dt, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_date(?,'yyyymmdd')))

sql:statement.name: R78_AccType
sql:statement.sql:query: select acct_nbr, acct_type_cd from R78_ACCTYPE where acct_nbr = ?
